verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Some thro' the waters, newline Some thro' the flood, newline Some thro' the fire, newline But all thro' the blood; newline Some thro' great sorrow, newline But God gives a song, newline In the night season, newline And all the day long.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: In shady, green pastures, newline So rich and so sweet, newline God leads His dear children along; newline Where the water's cool flow newline Bathes the weary one's feet, newline God leads His dear children along.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Sometimes on the mount newline Where the sun shines so bright, newline God leads His dear children along; newline Sometimes in the valley, newline In darkest of night, newline God leads His dear children along.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Though sorrows befall us newline And Satan oppose, newline God leads His dear children along; newline Through grace we can conquer, newline Defeat all our foes, newline God leads His dear children along.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Away from the mire newline And away from the clay, newline God leads His dear children along; newline Away up in glory, eternity's day newline God leads His dear children along.
